availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Auction firm in Louisville, Kentucky. Operated from 1830 to 1893. Partner(s): Thomas Anderson and George W. Anderson.

ab.bibl: The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), November 26, 1830, p. 4; Henry Tanner, comp., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville, KY: Henry Tanner, 1860), p. 21, 274; “By Thos. Anderson & Co, Auctioneers,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), March 21, 1877, p. 4; “To-Day’s Auction Sales,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), June 7, 1893, p. 3; “Large Auction Sales,” The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), November 19, 1983, p. 4.
